page.title: 02DYCE(ABERDEEN).
page.content: From Aberdeen to Dyce is nine miles. Dyce is now a suburb of Aberdeen.B.P's H.Q.is here with 100's of employees. There are over 100 oil companies in the Dyce area.Most of them are near the airport.Dyce is a new suburb,but it is low lying and aesthetic,despite being built fairly recently.It is a prosperous area & houses are dear. There are many new warehouses & offices in the industrial estates. Dyce heliport is the largest in the world.B.A.started in 1967 & now there are 120 flights each week carrying 3000 passengers as far as 258 miles offshore.They work 24 hrs a day,but do emergencies only from 2230-0630.Most work is transporting personnel,but air sea rescue,aerial crane work & schedu- led flights also feature.There are other operaters too,each with its own terminal & hangars.It is very busy.
